sentences.en: He banged his head against the lamppost and hurt it.
sentences.cn: 他的头撞晨了灯柱上,受了伤.

sentences.en: He drove full tilt intothe lamppost.
sentences.cn: 他车开得飞快,撞上了路灯柱.

sentences.en: He lost control of the car and smashed into a lamppost.
sentences.cn: 他的车失去了控制,撞上街灯柱.

sentences.en: I ran my head into the lamppost and hurt it.
sentences.cn: 我将头撞在灯柱上,撞伤了.

sentences.en: I stood against a lamppost and read it over. It'sounded preposterous.
sentences.cn: 我靠在一根灯柱上读了上面的话, 这封信写得有点荒谬.

sentences.en: I write better when I’m hungover and tied to a lamppost without access to my hands.
sentences.cn: 就算我宿醉未醒被绑在路灯柱上无法用手，我也比她写得好。

sentences.en: In his hurry he ran his head against a lamppost.
sentences.cn: 匆忙之中,他的头撞到了一根电灯杆上.

sentences.en: It annoys me if a lamppost is not bolt upright.
sentences.cn: 如果灯杆不是笔直的,我就感到烦恼.

sentences.en: Linda and Andrew were killed when the car crashed into a lamppost.
sentences.cn: 当琳达和安德鲁的车撞上了路灯柱时,他们丧生了.

sentences.en: Maybe that can help you approach the data lamppost with a bit more sobriety.
sentences.cn: 也许这可以帮助你找到能令你清醒一点的数据灯柱。

sentences.en: Paul got out of control of his car and ran it into a lamppost.
sentences.cn: 保罗没能把汽车控制住,结果把它撞到路灯柱子上去了.

sentences.en: Running down the street, I knocked up against the lamppost.
sentences.cn: 我沿街跑时撞上了电灯杆.

sentences.en: She was so sleepy that she ran into a lamppost.
sentences.cn: 她如此困倦,以致撞到路灯杆上.

sentences.en: The bus banged up a lamppost.
The car banged up a lamppost.
The dog cocked its leg ( against the lamppost ), ie in order to urinate.
sentences.cn: 狗(对着灯柱)抬起一只腿 ( 撒尿 ).

sentences.en: Vingo charged into a lamppost and hurt his arm.
sentences.cn: 文戈撞上了路灯柱,手臂受了伤.

words.tran_cn: 点灯用具；点燃街灯的灯夫

trans.tran_en: A lamppost is a tall metal or concrete pole that is fixed beside a road and has a light at the top
